messages.content: Because they enjoy their toxic umoderated cesspool, apparently. Either way i'm done trying to care.
Taking deep, measured breaths usually helps me regain my composure
Hunting would at least be more rewarding and fun. Every time I wanna meal prep in RDO I just horseback ride and lock-on to deer.
yes please, would make thing less overthinking and stressful
Cats/dogs for sure. It would be refreshing.
Glad I took the 1st half spread
I'm glad you made a Reddit account to inform us how much you totes don't care bro
Rest in peaches J2D or whatever his name was, nice meme
I’ll be honest I really don’t care. I’m happy to know that others care about this, but eh you do you
[NAME] instead of [NAME] for me, but glad to see [NAME] is doing well.
Yes. We're finishing the script out now. Shooting starts in February.
Glad I'm not the only one
I'm just glad we'll be getting either [NAME] or [NAME]. They both seem like they'll be beasts and it'll fill our greatest position of need
Yes, you do live in a clown world, laugh it up, degenerate.
Oh that’s actually seriously a relief, how do you know that though?
Having good people around you is the most important part i am glad you found some good friends:)
I’m sure the hornet will be happy if their curse is over!
Cheers, mate! I know you can do it! :)
Thank god I'm not dating anymore. I wouldn't want to risk some girl I'm trying to bang seeing my reddit history.
Look on the bright side. I dont know what your bright side is but just look at it.
I'm sorry, I can't hear your useless badgering over me drinking my 38' from a wine bottle and enjoying my extra $200.
I admit I’ll be fairly happy if we continue to invest in young internationals and sign a $100+ mil free agent every offseason.
these are quite normal thoughts for depressed people
It was received on Jan 25th at 9:22 am .81627 BTC and $3800. for it with a $600. fee. Happy!
The barriers in large only exist with respect to Canadian oil. Other producers (with the exclusion of Venezuela ) seem to be enjoying a very profitable time.
The applause came from [NAME] and his group.
It's good though because itll make you cherish the happy times while youre in them, instead of lookinf back on them.
Glad I tend to post pics of my cats and not myself.
Nihilism makes me happy, but I know that’s just my opinion.
i never thought i would read the phrase 600 lb cinematic universe but i am glad i did
